attributes.action: Naturalisation an EU Citizens who wish to become a British Citizens.
attributes.additional_details:
I would like to ask the British Parliament to consider a possibility of granting citizenship to people with EU passports, who meet the requirements for obtaining British passport. 
Many of us have certificates confirming knowledge of English language at the required level.
To apply for British Citizenship we need to pass the exam and pay a fees. Precisely these charges are the biggest obstacle. For a family of three fees are 3000 pound.
Thank you for your time. Yours sincerely Arkadiusz Guzik.
attributes.background:
To whom it may concern,
As a Polish citizen but also British resident I have to express my concern about our future in England after British people decided to leave the European Union.
